text: Ano toki fushinjin'na-sha-tachi wa, mune no naka ni manshin no nen o moyashita. Jāhirīya (jidai no yōna) muchi ni yoru manshindearu. Sorede arrā wa, shito to shinja no ue ni yasuragi o kudashi, kare-ra ni jisei no o kotoba o oshitsuke rareta. Kore wa kare-ra ga sono (yasuragi) ni ataishi, mata sore o ukeru tamedeatta. Arrā wa subete no koto o shitte ora reru
